Text: the audio was off for me.  about 3 seconds behind the video.  I played it in Quicktime. Any thoughts?

@ vastoholic,

Thanks For Informing.
Yes, Unfortunately Audio Is Out Of Sync.

Try "mkvmerge" And Set Audio Delay To Approx -2100ms.
You Will Get .mkv Output.

Use "Yamb" For .mp4 Output.


I was Wondering Over 200 Download Finished, Nobody Complained About This.
What's Wrong People?
Please Do Comment.
